properties.description: moving data from bronze to silver

ifFalseActivities.name: fetch_logs
ifFalseActivities.description: fetch logs from the databricks audit table"audit.load_logs"

query.value: @concat('select coalesce(cast(max(loaddate) as date),''','1900-01-01',''') as last_fetched_date from rcm_hc_adb_ws.audit.load_logs where',' data_source=''',pipeline().parameters.datasource,''' and tablename=''',pipeline().parameters.tablename,'''')

ifFalseActivities.name: incremental_load
ifFalseActivities.description: if the expression is not True (means not a full load), then we do incremental load

ifTrueActivities.name: Full_Load
ifTrueActivities.description: if its a full load, copy all the records and put it in bronze folder

ifFalseActivities.name: fetch_logs
ifFalseActivities.description: fetch logs from the databricks audit table"audit.load_logs"

query.value: @concat('select coalesce(cast(max(loaddate) as date),''','1900-01-01',''') as last_fetched_date from rcm_hc_adb_ws.audit.load_logs where',' data_source=''',item().datasource,''' and tablename=''',item().tablename,'''')

ifFalseActivities.name: incremental_load
ifFalseActivities.description: if the expression is not True (means not a full load), then we do incremental load

ifTrueActivities.name: Full_Load
ifTrueActivities.description: if its a full load copy all the records and put it in bronze folder
